description: This file defines a theming class for a Flutter application, specifying a custom light theme based on Material 3 design guidelines. It provides a static method `light()` that returns a `ThemeData` object with specific color schemes, input decoration styles, app bar and navigation rail themes, and text styling.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class providing static methods to generate application themes, specifically defining a light theme configuration.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with a light color scheme, custom styles for app bar, navigation rail, cards, input decorations, and text styles.
